bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition related to pregnancy. Pu ji fang 普濟方 337: 古今療胎病方有類十首，不問虛實冷熱， 殆死者活。此方（茯苓丸）緣妊娠忌桂，所以熬 , “There are dozens of recipes, throughout the ages, to cure fetal diseases , regardless of whether it is a depletion or repletion, a cold or heat, whether the fetus has died, or is still alive. Because gui must not be ingested during pregnancy, the present recipe requires it to be boiled”.
